archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0084
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, I want to be able to return a device, so that I can give it back if I change my mind

properties.value: What are the details: how many days it is allowed? What about payment return? What in case of anonymous buy. 10 days both for consumer (regulatory) and business (VF free will). Only applies for online. 30 days in case a customer doesn't like the service. Applies both for online and in a shop. Any payments done need to be returned. This can happen only after a check of the condition of the device (at Brightpoint or in store). Currently the refunds are processed manually by backoffice. Maybe this could be automated for DX. Process can be started online (return courier is sent back).

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
